title: EPM SQUARE ANALYTICS
text: This is the home page for EPM SQUARE ANALYTICS.

title: About
text:
Welcome to the EPM website! Here, you’ll find valuable insights into our services as both a training and consultancy company.
We provide training on the use of statistical software such as R, Python, SAS, and STATA, as well as practical guidance on conducting data analysis with these tools.
Our consultancy services include market research, data analysis, proposal writing, business plan development, statistical design, and analysis planning, among others.
You can book an initial call at https://calendly.com/ericodongo35/30min

title: Consulting Services
text: We offer consulting services in market research, survey design, advanced data analysis, proposal writing, business plans, design of experiments, statistical analysis plans among others. Our consulting services are custom-made according to the client needs and requirements. We will walk with you through all the major phases of consultancy which include Contact, Agreement, Information assessment, Feedback, Implementation, and Evaluation.

title: Training Services
text:
We offer training in the use of statistical packages like R, Python, SPSS, SAS, STATA among others. Our approach is hands-on always making sure that learners can actually use the tools effectively.
We also train people how to actually conduct data analysis using the given tools. We have expertise in clinical trial data analysis techniques like survival analysis, meta-analysis, etc, and we also excel in training common analysis methods in research like ANOVA, Regression, Mediation analysis, Multi-level modeling among others.

title: Company Profile
text: The company was founded in the year 2023 with an aim of offering training and consultancy services in broad areas of science and research. The focus is more on equipping individuals with necessary skills to help them conduct meaningful analysis of their own data.

title: Sample Works
text: This section contains sample projects that we have delivered to clients in the past. This section is meant to give you an overview into our philosophy and approach to projects. These projects range from data analysis reports, Rshiny applications, Dashboards etc.
